document_data.caption: A map showing Suldown Street and surroundings in the North Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Suldown Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Suldown Street'''<ref group="note">The entry for this street is written as "Suldoun Street" in some sources. was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Suldown Street was located in the south section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]]. The road originated on the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] at the broder with the [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] where it branched northeast into the North Ward. Suldown Street turned due east where it met [[Whaelgond Way]], eventually ending on [[Saerdoun Street]] near the [[Cliffwatch]] and outer city wall. Suldown Street was also intersected by [[Shando Street]], [[Tarnath Street]], [[Gelthoon Street]], [[Belzound Street]], [[Brahiir's Street]], and [[Nindabar Street]].
